title: South Africa : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: It is expected that by 2023 , around 49.0 millions Filipinos will become internet of a number internet .
Considering the forecasted population of around 118 millions , it reflects the high popularity of number media in the South Africa .

Current state of number media in the South Africa have been called the number media capital of the world , because most of the number media internet have an extraordinarily high usage time of about four hours per day .
gold: This statistic provides information on the number of internet users in South Africa from 2017 to 2023.
In 2018 , South Africa had 36.6 million internet users.
This figure is projected to grow to 49 million internet users in 2022 .
